node.title: Music producer Flow La Movie among 9 killed in plane crash
node.description: Helidosa Aviation Group gave no details on why the pilots aborted the flight or possible causes of the crash.
node.content: ["A small plane attempting to land minutes after beginning a flight to Florida crashed in the Dominican Republic on Wednesday, killing all nine people aboard, including Puerto Rican music producer Jos\u00e9 \u00c1ngel Hern\u00e1ndez, better known as Flow La Movie, the aircraft's operating company reported.\u00a0Helidosa Aviation Group said on its Twitter account that the Gulfstream jet was carrying two crew members and seven passengers.", "The plane had departed from El Hig\u00fcero airport for Orlando, Florida, shortly before seeking to land at Las Americas International Airport in the Dominican Republic's capital, Santo Domingo, the company said. The company gave no details on why the pilots aborted the flight or possible causes of the crash.", "FlightRadar24.com posted a map of the plane's flight path:", "A Gulfstream IV operated by @HelidosaGroup has crashed during a landing attempt at Santo Domingo Las Americas International Airport (SDQ). Because of the accident the airport is closed for take offs and landings.https://t.co/eOCI0D2yJLhttps://t.co/DPHo3dM46J pic.twitter.com/wxaGHD6Yot", "The airport shut down operations after the accident, canceling hundreds of flights.", "Hern\u00e1ndez, 38, also known as Flow La Movie, produced Urban Latin songs such as \"Te Bot\u00e9\" sung Bad Bunny and Ozuna. He also produced \"La Jeepeta\" by Nio Garcia, Brray and Juanka and \"Wow Remix,\" in which artists Bryant Myers, Arcangel, Nicky Jam, El Alfa and Darell participated.", "Helidosa Aviation said Hernandez was accompanied by six relatives and colleagues. It identified them as Debbie Von Marie Jimenez Garcia, Keilyan Hernandez, Hayden Hernandez, Yeilianys Jeishlimar Melendez Jimenez and Jesiel Yabdiel Silva. The crew members were Luis Alberto Eljuri and V\u00edctor Emilio Herrera, the company said.", "J Balvin was among several artists who paid tribute to Hernandez on social media.", "\"Jos\u00e9 \u00c1ngel THANK YOU FOR YOUR VIBRA ALTA ALWAYS !! Rest in peace,\" Balvin wrote in Spanish on Instagram.", "A post shared by J Balvin (@jbalvin)", "For Breaking News & Analysis Download the Free CBS News app"]
